Posted on January 28, 2019

Here are a few tricks and tips I apply to myself when I’m planning my vacation. I promise you, after watching this video, you’ll say “Oo nga noh!!! Bakit hindi ko to naisip” lol. 60 Hours No Sleep in Seoul, South Korea

Posted on January 20, 2019

This was probably one of the most exciting things I’ve done last year. I was invited to be part of Viu’s new show called “No Sleep, No FOMO” that will be airing next month. Basically, the show is all about how you can maximize your time in a new city/country if you only have less than 3 days there. 60 hours of no sleep might sound scary and tiring, but I honestly had the best time with Paul Foster (the main host) and Nat Ho. We went to Seoul and literally did so many challenges– spicy noodle challenge, snowboarding, dance lessons (my fave!), and …

Stripes and Stripes

Posted on January 9, 2019

Since I’m getting ready for my first trip this 2019, here’s a TBT of my look during one of my first few trips last year. Also, get ready for a lot of TBTs because I’ve so much photos to post I haven’t really uploaded anywhere lol. I wore this when I was in HK around March last year. The weather was great, chilly but not cold. I got this beautiful coords from Society A, one of my favorite luxury websites. They have a good selection of Asian designers, including the one I’m wearing right now, Ying the Label.

Posted on January 5, 2019

Bagong taon nanaman guys! Hope you all had a wonderful holiday break– I know I did. I stayed in Manila and enjoyed spending time with my family and friends. I really like being in the city after Christmas because walang traffic and I really get to just slow it down and take a break. After traveling so much for work the past few months, I literally wanted to just Netflix and chill the entire holiday week! I was also thinking of my New Year’s resolutions this 2019 and I’m sharing a few here.
